src:
Sporočilo uredništvom - izjava po srečanju z Direkcijo RS za vode in ministrstvom za okolje in prostor

06 Nov 2019, 07:30


Ljubljana, 6. novembra - Izjava za medije po delovnem srečanju z Direkcijo RS za vode in ministrstvom za okolje in prostor na temo poplavne ogroženosti in sprejemanja občinskega prostorskega načrta, bo danes, predvidoma ob 11.30 v Expanu na Bakovski ulici 41 v Murski Soboti, srečanje pa bo za medije zaprto, so sporočili iz Zavoda za turizem in razvoj Lendava.
text:
Message to the editorial boards - statement after meeting with the Water Directorate and the Ministry of the Environment and Spatial Planning

06 Nov 2019, 07:30


Ljubljana, 6 November - Press release after a working meeting with the Water Directorate and the Ministry of the Environment and Spatial Planning on the topic of flood risk and adoption of the municipal spatial plan The press release will be closed to the media, the Lendava Institute for Tourism and Development said.
